description:
This course its design to prepare yourself to take the Autodesk Professional Revit Architecture 2015 Certification

This certification its an excellent way to measure the knowledge you have about using Revit Architecture 2015, as well as to go deeper in some topics about how to perform proficiently with the tool.

This course would guide you about evaluation topics with similar questions that you would have to solve on the Certification Exam.

Its recomended that you have accomplish more than 400 hrs using Revit and that you know its functionality.

Its not a course about modeling in Revit, it assumes that you have basic knowledge, and it has a mockup exam similar to the one you need to complete.

The official exam has 35 questions from which you need to pass 32 to get the certificate on a time cap of 2 hrs 40 min, this course its based on Metric Units.

The general structure its splitted on two parts first some explanation to the concepts that the certification wants, and then the Mockup Exam

All questions are multiple answer even thought on the exam you may have open questions, match columns, select an image etc.

¿Are you tired of courses that go too fast or are too extense? Don´t worry "Jump between sections, repeat as many times as you like", The course access its lifetime and would be updated to future versions of the exam, follow us and check future courses, everything at hand distance.

It has forums, so you can ask any doubt my answer time is two days except on holidays.

Be the first to know about future courses by Mag Architecture & Technology Solutions S.A. de C.V. and take advantage of all the oportunities delivered so you are up to date and may lead you to beteer work and professional positions.
title: Autodesk Revit 2015 Architecture Professional Certificate
